hero.headline: Your Properties, Your Way
hero.subheadline: One platform to rule them all
hero.description: Comprehensive tools for real estate operations. Manage your entire property portfolio with automated workflows, tenant portals, and financial insights all in one place.

services.title: Everything You Need, All in One Place
services.subtitle: Stop juggling multiple tools and systems. REOS brings property management, tenant communication, and financial insights together so you can run your portfolio with confidence.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Built for modern property managers who demand efficiency without compromise.

portfolioDashboard.title: Portfolio Dashboard
portfolioDashboard.description: See your entire portfolio at a glance. Monitor occupancy, track lease renewals, and spot opportunities before they pass you by.

tenantSelfService.title: Tenant Self-Service
tenantSelfService.description: Empower tenants with online rent payments, maintenance requests, and document access. Fewer phone calls, happier tenants.

automatedWorkflows.title: Automated Workflows
automatedWorkflows.description: Set it and forget it. Automated rent reminders, lease renewals, and maintenance scheduling keep your operations running smoothly.

financialInsights.title: Financial Insights
financialInsights.description: Real-time dashboards show revenue, expenses, and cash flow across your portfolio. Make data-driven decisions with confidence.

documentManagement.title: Document Management
documentManagement.description: Secure cloud storage for leases, contracts, and compliance documents. Find anything in seconds with powerful search.

teamCollaboration.title: Team Collaboration
teamCollaboration.description: Keep your team aligned with shared calendars, task assignments, and unified communication channels.

process.title: Up and Running in Minutes
process.subtitle: Four simple steps to transform how you manage properties. No technical expertise required—just follow the path and start saving time today.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your portfolio. No hidden fees, no surprises.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for landlords just getting started

team.title: The People Behind REOS
team.subtitle: We started REOS because we believe property managers deserve better tools. Our team combines real estate expertise with technical innovation to build software that actually works for you.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about REOS and how it can transform your property management.

whatIs.question: What is REOS?
whatIs.answer: REOS is a comprehensive property management platform designed for modern landlords and property managers. It combines portfolio tracking, tenant communication, financial management, and automation tools into one intuitive interface.

pricing.question: How does pricing work?
pricing.answer: We offer three tiers based on portfolio size: Starter ($29/month for up to 10 units), Professional ($79/month for up to 50 units), and Enterprise (custom pricing for unlimited units). All plans include a 14-day free trial with no credit card required.

services.question: Which services are included?
services.answer: Every plan includes core features like property dashboard, tenant portal, online rent collection, and maintenance tracking. Higher tiers add advanced analytics, automated workflows, document management, and priority support.

trial.question: Is there a free trial?
trial.answer: Yes! All plans come with a 14-day free trial with full access to features. No credit card required to start. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel anytime.

getStarted.question: How do I get started?
getStarted.answer: Sign up takes less than 2 minutes. Create your account, add your first property, and you're ready to go. We also offer guided onboarding and a library of help resources to get you up to speed quickly.

footer.description: Comprehensive property management tools for modern landlords and property managers.

residency.description: Your residency status determines applicable tax benefits and affects the property purchase process.

nonResident.label: Non-resident

ownsProperty.description: This affects the tax treatment on additional property purchases, including purchase tax rates.
